vote.title: Authorize a budget estimate of the needs and requirements of the Office of the City Auditor for Fiscal Year 2021-22 in the amount of $3,004,204.00 (subject to final citywide funding adjustments for decisions that will be made on a citywide basis for items such as staff benefits, insurance, Department of Information and Technology Services chargebacks, and other items that may affect all City departmental budgets) - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
